original_text: and the chief of the eunuchs said to Daniel, “I fear my lord the king, who assigned your food and your drink; for why should he see that you were in worse condition than the youths who are of your own age? So you would endanger my head with the king.”
korean_text: 환관장이 다니엘에게 이르되 내가 내 주 왕을 두려워하노라 그가 너희 먹을 것과 너희 마실 것을 지정하셨거늘 너희의 얼굴이 초췌하여 같은 또래의 소년들만 못한 것을 그가 보게 할 것이 무엇이냐 그렇게 되면 너희 때문에 내 머리가 왕 앞에서 위태롭게 되리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: and the chief of the eunuchs said to Daniel,
I fear my lord the king,
who assigned your food and your drink;
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희 먹을 것과 너희 마실 것을 정하였으니

sentences.original_text: that you were in worse condition
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 더 나쁜 상태에 있는 것을

sentences.original_text: than the youths who are of your own age?
So you would endanger my head with the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 네가 나로 말미암아 왕에게 죄를 얻게 하리라
